short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape text from a single webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple web scraper for saving text from a single, simple webpage. (NOTE: This does not preserve the structure of tables, charts, or complicated webpages.)

Created as part of a master's degree thesis on simple software solutions. You can view the code repository at https://github.com/staram/webscraper-extension-single-page
